plot outline: This youthful romantic drama traces the trials and triumphs in the life of a sincere man, who falls in love but is forced by circumstances to face the agony of separation and loss. Will he succeed in uniting with his beloved? How will his future unfold?
title: Ishtartha
plot: This youthful romantic drama traces the trials and triumphs in the life of a sincere man, who falls in love but is forced by circumstances to face the agony of separation and loss. Will he succeed in uniting with his beloved? How will his future unfold?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
